title: NBA All-Star Game, Tom Brady to the Raiders and the Astros Cheating Scandal
itunes:title: NBA All-Star Game, Tom Brady to the Raiders and the Astros Cheating Scandal
description:
Colin explains why the NBA All-Star game was a success, why he doesn’t see Tom Brady signing with the Raiders, his thoughts on the NFL draft rumors, why he is defending MLB commissioner Rob Manfred, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Stephen Jackson, Rich Ohrnberger, Albert Breer, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
